title: title
body:
Helper.js enables more hbs conditions

  • #any - if attribute1 or attribute2
  • #all - if attribute1 && attribute2

title: title
body:
it also enables hbs rendering methods

  • lowercase
  • capitalise
  • inc - json array index+1
  • dec - json array index-1
  • odd - checks if item is odd
  • compare - compares attributes
  • math - performs math method on attributes
  • equals

title: title
body:
Text compiling methods:

  • compile_a11y_text - allow JSON to be a template and accessible text
  • compile_a11y_normalize - Allow JSON to be a template and normalized text
  • compile_a11y_remove_breaks - Remove all html tags except styling tags
  • import_globals - makes the _globals object in course.json available to a template
  • import_adapt - makes the Adapt module data available to a template
